lead_paragraph: With a score of 16.175 on the balance beam, the highest mark of the day on any event, Shawn Johnson clinched the gold medal yesterday in the women’s gymnastics all-around at the Pan American Games in Rio de Janeiro. Johnson, 15, totaled 61.725 to lead a United States sweep, with Rebecca Bross winning silver (61.050) and Ivana Hong bronze (59.375).
